Accuracy.description: The correctness and precision of the final answer.

Completeness.description: Whether every aspect of the task has been considered and addressed in the solution.

Efficiency.description: The optimal use of resources and time by agents to solve the task.

Reasoning Traceability.description: The ability to understand and follow the thought process and logical steps of the agents.

Originality.description: The uniqueness of the solution and its independence from existing internet sources.

Collaboration.description: How well the agents work in unison to achieve the task's goal.

Responsiveness.description: The promptness of the multi-agent system in processing and responding to the task.
